title: Comparative Education on Learning Effectiveness of Computer and Manikin Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Medical/Life Science Concepts and Basic Principles for Emergency Situations
context.additional_context: Integrated Course Combining Computer Simulations Accessible via Smartphones and Manikin Practice in Limited Environments

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose virtual patient conditions and select appropriate interventions in computer simulations with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can perform emergency response protocols in mannequin simulations with ≥70% success rate
Learners can compare the strengths and weaknesses of two simulation methods and develop the ability to select appropriate tools based on learning contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
